translation.Professional platform for construction s: Professional platform for construction services in Dubai
translation.Buildlify is a comprehensive platform th: Buildlify is a comprehensive platform that connects customers with verified construction professionals in Dubai. Our app provides AI-powered interior design generation, secure payment processing, and quality assurance for all construction projects.

translation.Find answers to common questions about u: Find answers to common questions about using Buildify
translation.Buildify is a platform that connects cus: Buildify is a platform that connects customers with verified construction workers and specialists. Whether you need repairs, renovations, or design services, we help you find qualified professionals in your area.
translation.How do I create an order?: How do I create an order?
translation.To create an order: 1) Go to the \"Creat: To create an order: 1) Go to the "Create order" tab, 2) Select the type of work you need, 3) Add a description and photos, 4) Set your budget and timeline, 5) Submit the order. Workers will then respond with their proposals.
translation.Payment is processed securely through ou: Payment is processed securely through our platform. You can set your budget when creating an order, and payment is released to the worker once the job is completed to your satisfaction.
translation.Yes, all workers on our platform must up: Yes, all workers on our platform must upload and verify their professional licenses. Our team reviews each application to ensure only qualified professionals can work on your projects.
translation.How can I become a worker on the platfor: How can I become a worker on the platform?
translation.To become a worker: 1) Register and sele: To become a worker: 1) Register and select "I am a performer", 2) Upload your professional license, 3) Complete your profile with experience and portfolio, 4) Wait for verification approval, 5) Start browsing and responding to orders.
translation.What are the benefits of subscription?: What are the benefits of subscription?
translation.Subscription gives workers access to mor: Subscription gives workers access to more orders, the ability to view customer contacts, and increased response limits. Different plans offer different benefits to help grow your business.
translation.Our AI design generation feature allows: Our AI design generation feature allows you to create interior design concepts based on your photos and descriptions. Simply upload images of your space and describe what you want - our AI will generate design options for you.
translation.Your portfolio showcases your previous w: Your portfolio showcases your previous work and helps customers understand your style and quality. A strong portfolio with high-quality images increases your chances of being selected for orders.
translation.What do different order statuses mean?: What do different order statuses mean?
translation.Order statuses help track progress: \"Pu: Order statuses help track progress: "Published" - order is live and accepting responses, "In review" - customer is reviewing responses, "In progress" - work is being done, "Completed" - work is finished and approved.
translation.You can contact our support team through: You can contact our support team through the "Support" section in the menu. Describe your issue and our team will help you resolve it as quickly as possible.
translation.What languages does the app support?: What languages does the app support?
translation.Currently, the app supports English and: Currently, the app supports English and Arabic. You can change the language in Settings > Language settings at any time.
translation.We use industry-standard security measur: We use industry-standard security measures including encrypted data transmission, secure authentication, and regular security audits to protect your personal information and transactions.
translation.Contact our support team for personalize: Contact our support team for personalized help

translation.Find reliable contractors and specialist: Find reliable contractors and specialists for any construction project. From small repairs to major renovations - we have professionals for every task.
translation.Create detailed orders with photos, desc: Create detailed orders with photos, descriptions, and budget. Our smart matching system will connect you with the best specialists in your area.
translation.All our contractors are verified profess: All our contractors are verified professionals. Track progress, communicate directly, and pay securely through our platform.
translation.Connect with customers who need your exp: Connect with customers who need your expertise. Find construction projects that match your skills and grow your business with us.
translation.Browse orders in your area and specializ: Browse orders in your area and specialization. Apply to projects that interest you and build your reputation with quality work.

translation.Cancel subscription billing disclaimer:
• Subscription will be cancelled at the end of current billing period
• No refunds for partial period usage
• You will retain access until period ends
• Charges may still appear until cancellation is processed
translation.Subscription cancellation note: Note: Subscription will be cancelled at the end of the current billing period. You will retain access until then.
translation.Withdraw response warning:
Are you sure you want to withdraw your response? Please note:

• This action cannot be undone
• You may lose priority access to this order
• If you already viewed customer contacts, charges may still apply according to your subscription plan
• Future responses to this order may be limited

Proceed with withdrawal?
translation.View contacts billing warning:
Viewing customer contacts will be charged according to your subscription plan. This action will count towards your contacts limit.

Proceed with viewing contacts?
